tool_description: Determines design wind speeds and pressure coefficients based on location, terrain, and building characteristics.

building_height.description: Building height above ground in meters, range 3-300

terrain_category.description: Terrain exposure category (A, B, C, or D)

building_width.description: Building width perpendicular to wind in meters, range 5-200

building_depth.description: Building depth parallel to wind in meters, range 5-200

risk_category.description: Building risk category (I, II, III, or IV)

error_messages: Invalid building dimensions: Height must be 3-300m, width and depth must be 5-200m. Check architectural drawings.
Invalid terrain category: Must be A, B, C, or D. Assess surrounding terrain within 1.6km radius.
Invalid topographic factor: Must be 1.0-1.5. Use 1.0 for flat terrain or calculate per code provisions.
Location outside wind map coverage: Coordinates may be outside available wind speed database.
usage: Input site coordinates, building dimensions, terrain exposure, and risk category. Tool retrieves basic wind speed from maps and calculates design wind speeds with all applicable factors.

basic_wind_speed.description: Basic wind speed from hazard maps in m/s

design_wind_speed.description: Design wind speed including all factors in m/s

velocity_pressure.description: Velocity pressure at building height in Pa

gust_factor.description: Gust effect factor for dynamic response
